attributes.action: To ask the British people if they want British troops on the ground in Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: Ukrainian people are exactly like us. There is a real potential that we could one day be having to learn how to use machine guns and make Molotov cocktails, to protect our homes and our children. Ukrainian people are fighting alone. Would we also have to fight alone? Would the rest of the world leave us abandoned in our time of need? Would they also take days to debate sanctions as innocent people die in an illegal war?
attributes.background: I would like it put to the general public, whether they want the UK to send troops in to fight along side Ukraine. Make sure that all the information is shared, the truth about the nuclear threat that Vladimir Putin has given if we send troops in. The consequences of us not sending in troops shared.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

It's not clear if you want the Government to hold a referendum to determine whether to the UK should take military action in Ukraine, or do something else.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
